org.red5.server.api
Interface Stream

All Known Subinterfaces:
BroadcastStream, OnDemandStream
public interface Stream

Base interface for stream objects Provides all the common methods shared between OnDemandStream and BroadcastStream

Method Summary
 void close()
          Close this stream, this will disconnect all clients
